tool_description: This API helps to query for movies, actors, theaters, showtime, etc... to create a site/application, such as : rottentomatoes.com, flixster.com
name: Flixster
title: Flixster

api_list.name: news/list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flixster.p.rapidapi.com/news/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flixster.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://flixster.p.rapidapi.com/news/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flixster.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: reviews/list
api_list.description: List reviews related to a movie

required_parameters.name: emsId
required_parameters.description: The value of emsId field returned in .../movies/get-opening , .../movies/get-popularity , .../movies/get-upcoming , .../movies/get-dvds , .../search endpoint

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response, for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: withComments
optional_parameters.description: Whether or not including children comments

api_list.name: actors/detail
api_list.description: Get detailed information of an actor/actress

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of people -> id field returned in .../search endpoint

api_list.name: theaters/detail

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../theaters/list or .../search endpoint

api_list.name: theaters/list
api_list.description: List theaters around a postal code or GEO location

api_list.name: movies/detail

required_parameters.name: emsVersionId
required_parameters.description: The value of emsVersionId field returned in .../movies/get-opening , .../movies/get-popularity , .../movies/get-upcoming , .../movies/get-dvds , .../search endpoint

api_list.name: movies/get-upcoming

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of itemed returned, maximum is 100

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: Search for movies, actors, theaters by term and phrase

api_list.name: movies/get-dvds
api_list.description: Get movies that watch at home

api_list.name: movies/get-popularity
